description: His voice had a promising sound - young and cute. When he called me the day before I was already exited and curious how he might look like. And indeed he was that kind of young male client which I like most. His apartment was well-furnished and I could clearly see that he lived there before with a girl. We spoke about his debts - nothing unusual. He owed to a bank and to friends. All together around 25 000 CZK, actually not that much. But for him it was a desperate situation. He lost his job 3 months ago and even if he would find a new job today it would at least take one month until a first regular salary. Knowing this I went straight to the point. I wanted his ass and I offered him to pay his debts - easy. And his reaction was as expected.
title: Debt Dandy 109
